title: Similarity
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Donald Batchelor
brief_description: Illustrates the drawing of objects and diagrams to scale and indicates the mathematical relationship between the sizes by representative fractions or scale fractions. From the series “Visions in mathematics”.
